column2: House for Rent in Balapokuna Road
column6: This road facing house is situated in a tranquil and peaceful commercialized as well as residential and well secured convenient location close to the Nugegoda junction off High Level road and is situated within close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls, leading International and local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc, it is only about 30 minutes drive to downtown Colombo and in a prime location to access most of the towns in and around Colombo and the suburbs.It is a luxurious fully tiled and spacious three storied house with a car porch. It consists of a spacious sitting and dinning room, 3 spacious bed rooms with the (master bedroom fitted with AC), all with attached bathrooms, one common bathroom, a very large and elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, there is a basement type area with two separate entrances with 2 large rooms a meeting area and a courtyard as well.There is a double car porch (with parking facilities for four vehicles), surrounded by a high parapet wall with two automated roller gates and a small wooden door for the main entrances.Ideally suited for an office, NGO, lawyers and or architects or any other similar commercial or residential use.
